body: This spell functions like disguise self, except that you can change the appearance of other people as well. Affected creatures resume their normal appearances if slain. Unwilling targets can negate the spell's effect on them by making Will saves or with spell resistance.
saving_throw: Will negates or Will disbelief (if interacted with)
description: Changes appearance of 1 person per 2 levels.

effects.text: one creature per two levels, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
effects.name: Targets

name: Seeming
